```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
setwd("C:/Users/frank/Dropbox/surv-paper")
d<-read.csv("scn-out.csv", colClasses=c("character", "integer", "integer", "integer"))

d$tot.rpt<-d$scrn.in+d$scrn.out

d$delta.rpt.2014<-NA
d$delta.in.2014<-NA
d$delta.out.2014<-NA

for(i in unique(d$state)){
  z<-which(d$state==i)
  index<-z[which(d[z, "year"]==2014)]
  init.tot<-d[index, "tot.rpt"]
  init.in<-d[index, "scrn.in"]
  init.out<-d[index, "scrn.out"]
  d$delta.rpt.2014[z]<-d[z,"tot.rpt"]/init.tot
  d$delta.in.2014[z]<-d[z,"scrn.in"]/init.in
  d$delta.out.2014[z]<-d[z,"scrn.out"]/init.out
  
}

ggplot(d, aes(y=delta.rpt.2014, x=year))+geom_line()+facet_wrap(~state)
ggplot(d, aes(y=delta.in.2014, x=year))+geom_line()+facet_wrap(~state)
ggplot(d, aes(y=log(delta.out.2014), x=year))+geom_line()+facet_wrap(~state)

```
